DOC.brief_summary: The MONOD trial aim evaluate implementation early antiretroviral treatment strategy HIV-infected infant assess feasibility efficacy simplify initial propose regimen successful one year treatment . The initial treatment AZT-3TC-LPV/r twice day . After one year , child randomize one following : arm 1-reference AZT-3TC-LPV/r twice daily ; arm 2-simplified ABC-3TC-EFV daily . The perspective project identify antiretroviral strategy improve treatment access adherence child sub-saharian Africa .
